TANGO EN FLOR
Springtime Festivalito
May 10-12, 2024
Podgorica, Montenegro
Register
Tango en Flor is brought to life by Tango i tačka, a tango school that has been an essential part of the welcoming and youthful Podgorica tango community since 2016.
Venue
Tango en Flor will take place at the iconic Hard Rock Cafe Podgorica, located in the very heart of the city. All milongas and workshops will be held in the exclusive upper level of HRC, a private area that boasts an inviting dance podium equipped with a top-notch sound system, a comfortable bar area, and an outside terrace overlooking the main city square.
Couples
Their love for tango will inspire our embraces. Their presence will make our dance floor come alive. We're thrilled to introduce these three exceptional couples, all eager to share their tango with us.
Relja Dereta
& Anđela Djiki Ristić
(Serbia)
Osky Casas
& Magdalena Vračarić
(Argentina/Croatia)
Emir Ljaljević
& Andrea Drljević
(Montenegro)
DJs
We've carefully handpicked our musicalizadores to ensure an unending flow of irresistible golden-age melodies that will effortlessly keep you tied to the dance floor. The Hard Rock Cafe vibe is in the place!
DJ Osky Casas
(Argentina)
DJ Djiki
(Serbia)
DJ Davor Perhaj
(Croatia)
DJ Luka Radunović
(Montenegro)
DJ Boban Šćepanović
(Montenegro)
